title: Elibank Residency, Luxury 3 Bed Rooms Apartment For Sale
details:
Elibank Residency in Elibank Road in Colombo 5
Highly residential area in Colombo 5 with easy access to all directions in Colombo city
Small apartment complex well build on this area with all facilities
As the fewer no of apartments in the complex it is more a homely environment for peaceful living in the city
Complex apartments are with all property approvals and COC and Deeds for the apartments
3 Bed Rooms apartment on the higher floor with a good city view
3 bed Rooms with 2 bath rooms
Maids area with facilities
Very good apartment for a family living
Higher rental potential and higher value appreciation for the property
Rare Opportunity to buy an apartment in the complex
Higher Value appreciation for the property
